titleStmt.title: A testimony to the doctrine, worship, discipline, and government of the Church of Scotland, and the covenanted work of reformation as it was profess'd in the three kingdoms together with an account of the persecution of some of the most eminent in our days for their adherence to the same / as it was left in write by ... Mr. John Dick ; to which is added, his last speech and behaviour on the scaffold, on the fifth day of March 1684 ... never published till now ...
titleStmt.author: Dick, John, d. 1684.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Pages 49-50 and 55-57 are cropped in filmed copy. Pages 30-end of book photographed from National Library of Scotland (Advocates') copy and inserted at the end.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
